responses.title: I've got fire in my eyes!
One little spark and before you know it, the whole world is burning.
First Blood! This one's gonna be a scorcher!
Better to burn out than fade away.
Too many irons in the fire…
Held your feet to the fire.
It's not the heat, it's the humiliation.
Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
Ha ha ha ha ha ha!
And that's how you start a forest fire.
Who would have thought a dragon wouldn't be fireproof.
That one had a steamy ending.
Aw, I thought we were steam friends.
Should have thrown you on the pyre sooner.
Was that a cookbook? Cause I cooked it.
Drow, I think you're warming up to me.
I made fish sticks. Who wants one?
Flames like that should make you feel right at home, Lion.
Not even the fires of hell are a match for my flame.
Why'd you stop? This isn't Batrider country.
I'll show you how fire flies.
This is one bridge I don't mind burning.
Sorry sister, but you needed thawing.
We always did run hot and cold.
Burned you in effigy already. Now for real.
Oh sister, I kept the home fires burning.
Crystal Maiden? More like Crystal Meltin'.
You always were a cold one.
Clinkz! A skeleton after my own heart.
Ah, Jakiro, I hope that icy head of yours hasn't cooled your temper.
Come on, Batrider, let's set the world on fire.
Let's see what hell has paid you, Lion.
Come on, sis, let's get this over with.
Well, I suppose ice has got to be good for something.
We're sisters, so let's make the best of it.
Can't put me out that easily.
Is it me or is it getting hot in here?
Looks like it's gonna be a scorcher.
Stoke those flames, I'm coming in.
I'm not resting till there's nothing left to burn.
Ooh, it's chilly. Throw another hero on the fire.
Some say the world will end in fire. Sounds all right to me.
When you play with Lina, you tend to get burned.(Using taunt)
Scorched earth is my only policy.
Fire makes a fine servant but a harsh mistress.
That gold was burning a hole in my pocket.
This fire will never go out!
With this I'll start a fire they can never put out.
It's not that easy to snuff me out.
It's the flame that feeds itself!
What you can't see can still burn you.
Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
